name: Anti Sobriety Scavanger
description:
Anti Sobriety Scavanger tells the story of a town under Prohibition 2.0 - the government has restricted alcohol sales and now everyone is suspicious of new faces that may be undercover cops.
Your goal is to get as drunk as possible by the end of the night by convincing people to befriend you and buy you drinks.

Made for the AI and Games Gamejam 2021
The theme was "Breaking the Rules"

Content made before the jam:
Main menu layout and code
Save game code

Other assets credited in Help in main menu

Made by Samuel Burnett (Desktoy)
